name: Weather Pong (X Game Dev)
description:
A pastel rendition of the beloved arcade game, Weather Pong is a casual game you can play with a friend with just one keyboard! Select from 3 modes, each with a different stage.

Controls

Main menu: mouse + left click to interact

Player 1 controls: W (up) and S (down)

Player 2 controls: Up arrow key and Down arrow key

Modes

Easy: Slow and easy speed; Best of 3

Medium: Speed cranks up a bit; Best of 5

Hard: Blink and you may miss it; Best of 10
